system.description:
Your fury in combat knows no bounds. When you enter battle, primal rage courses through your veins, making your strikes devastating but leaving you vulnerable to counterattacks.

This raw aggression stems from ancestral warriors who fought without fear, channeling pure violence into every blow.
system.mechanic:
Combat Bonus: +2 to Strike (offense), -1 to Defense (vulnerability)

Active Ability: Once per combat, you may enter a berserker state as a free action. While in this state, all damage you deal is increased by 50%, but you cannot use defensive actions or dodge.
